verses.verse: Think <WH2803> you this <WH2063> to be right, <WH4941> that you said, <WH559> My righteousness <WH6664> is more <WH3254> than God's? <WH410>
For you said, <WH559> What <WH4100> advantage <WH5532> will it be to you? and, What <WH4100> profit <WH3276> shall I have, if I be cleansed from my sin? <WH2403>
I will answer <WH7725> <WH4405> you, and your companions <WH7453> with you.
Look <WH5027> to the heavens, <WH8064> and see; <WH7200> and behold <WH7789> the clouds <WH7834> which are higher <WH1361> than you.
If <WH518> you sin, <WH2398> what <WH4100> do <WH6466> you against him? or if your transgressions <WH6588> be multiplied, <WH7231> what <WH4100> do <WH6213> you to him?
If <WH518> you be righteous, <WH6663> what <WH4100> give <WH5414> you him? or <WH176> what <WH4100> receives <WH3947> he of your hand? <WH3027>
Your wickedness <WH7562> may hurt a man <WH376> as you are; and your righteousness <WH6666> may profit the son <WH1121> of man. <WH120>
By reason of the multitude <WH7230> of oppressions <WH6217> they make the oppressed to cry: <WH2199> they cry <WH7768> out by reason of the arm <WH2220> of the mighty. <WH7227>
But none <WH3808> said, <WH559> Where <WH335> is God <WH433> my maker, <WH6213> who gives <WH5414> songs <WH2158> in the night; <WH3915>
Who teaches <WH502> us more than the beasts <WH929> of the earth, <WH776> and makes us wiser <WH2449> than the fowls <WH5775> of heaven? <WH8064>
There <WH8033> they cry, <WH6817> but none <WH3808> gives answer, <WH6030> because <WH6440> of the pride <WH1347> of evil <WH7451> men.
Surely <WH389> God <WH410> will not hear <WH8085> vanity, <WH7723> neither <WH3808> will the Almighty <WH7706> regard <WH7789> it.
Although <WH637> <WH3588> you say <WH559> you shall not see <WH7789> him, yet judgment <WH1779> is before <WH6440> him; therefore trust <WH2342> you in him.
But now, <WH6258> because <WH3588> it is not so, he has visited <WH6485> in his anger; <WH639> yet he knows <WH3045> it not in great <WH3966> extremity: <WH6580>
Therefore does Job <WH347> open <WH6475> his mouth <WH6310> in vain; <WH1892> he multiplies <WH3527> words <WH4405> without <WH1097> knowledge. <WH1847>
